SELECT p_no,subject,id,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,rcount,num FROM (SELECT p_no,subject,id,regdate,hit,rcount,rownum as num FROM (SELECT p_no,subject,id,regdate,hit,rcount FROM pbo_4 ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT q_no,subject,id,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, isreply, group_id, group_step, group_tab, num FROM (SELECT q_no,subject,id, regdate, hit,isreply, group_id, group_step, group_tab, rownum as num FROM (SELECT q_no,subject,id, regdate, hit,isreply, group_id, group_step, group_tab FROM qbo_4 WHERE isreply = '0' AND GROUP_STEP = '0' ORDER BY q_no DESC )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10.0) FROM qbo_4 WHERE isreply='0' AND GROUP_STEP='0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qbo_4(q_no, name, id, subject, content, pwd, group_id, group_tab, group_step) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(q_no)+1,1) FROM qbo_4), #{name}, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{pwd}, #{group_id}, #{group_tab}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_step)+1,1) FROM qbo_4 WHERE group_id=#{group_id}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE qbo_4 SET isreply=isreply+1 WHERE q_no=#{q_no}
mapper.select: SELECT ord_info_4.oi_no, ord_info_4.order_date, ord_info_4.order_time, ord_info_4.regdate , ord_info_4.msg, ord_info_4.o_no, id, state, ord_4.poster, ord_4.price, ord_4.store, ord_4.name FROM ORD_INFO_4 LEFT JOIN ORD_4 ON ORD_INFO_4.o_no = ord_4.o_no ORDER BY state ASC
